conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'campaign' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'campaignId'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'getMetrics' THEN SHOW parameter 'campaignId'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'getMetrics' THEN SHOW parameter 'period'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'getMetrics' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'campaign' AND operation == 'getMetrics' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'customer' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'upsert' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFieldsJson'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'upsert' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'event' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'track' THEN SHOW parameter 'customerId'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'track' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventName'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'track' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'track' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFieldsJson'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'track' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'trackAnonymous' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventName'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'trackAnonymous' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'trackAnonymous' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFieldsJson'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'trackAnonymous' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'segment' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'segment' AND operation IN ["add", "remove"] THEN SHOW parameter 'segmentId'
IF resource == 'segment' AND operation IN ["add", "remove"] THEN SHOW parameter 'customerIds'
